text: The 2004 Volvo PGA Championship was the 50th edition of the Volvo PGA Championship, an annual professional golf tournament on the European Tour. It was held 27–30 May at the West Course of Wentworth Club in Virginia Water, Surrey, England, a suburb southwest of London. Scott Drummond won by two strokes ahead of Ángel Cabrera. == Course layout == == Past champions in the field == Nine former champions entered the tournament. === Made the cut === {| class="wikitable"
